short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your screen back. More tabs, more bars, less clutter. Our Bar extension keeps your browsing smooth and your laptop cool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Browser's Best Friend!

Keep all your important tabs 1 click away without turning your computer into a space heater. Effortlessly organize and access your essential tabs while your CPU stays cool and your RAM stays free. Perfect for researchers, multitaskers, and anyone who's ever had Chrome eat their computer alive.

New features:

1. Search
2. Reorder
+ Minor fixes and improvements

Key Features:

1. Sleek sidebar utilizing unused screen space
2. One-click access to saved tabs
3. Organize your browsing effortlessly

How to Use:

1. Install The Barman
2. Open the sidebar by clicking The Barman icon
3. Click the plus button to add tabs
4. Choose 'Add All' to save all open tabs, or select specific tabs to keep

Benefits:

1. Never lose important tabs again
2. Access your favorite sites instantly
3. Boost your browsing productivity

Try The Barman today - it's free! Transform your Chrome experience with just a few clicks.
